name: Alchemist's Frost
text: Alchemist’s frost is sealed in an insulated ceramic vial. When it shatters, the sudden exposure to air causes the alchemist’s frost to expand and freeze.  Modification: Ammunition (level + 1). You create this item for use with a ranged weapon such as a bow, a crossbow, or a sling. Item’s range becomes the range of the weapon but continues to use the indicated attack modifier. You do not include a weapon’s proficiency bonus or enhancement bonus in the attack. The item’s component cost corresponds to the table below.
flavorText: This ceramic flask explodes in an icy haze when it hits, crippling its target with numbing cold.
